resources.string: This is auto-delete section from where you can set the expiration time, after which older news will be automatically deleted from your internal storage.
Android Based News App for Fast and Ad-free Experience - ARKNews

With the advent and spread of new generation mobile devices and the latest technology, the necessity of a real revolution in the media and publishing industry has touched its highest peak. We are being exposed to an excessive amount of information every day that sometimes itâ€™s quite tough to keep a record of those necessary and authentic ones for an individual. Hence, introducing a news app that can provide users real-time access to relevant, prominent and genuine news to keep them up-to-date with the global affairs is a prime concern.\n

- Understanding news management
- Experiencing to create, maintain and manipulate large database
- Easy to track relevant information
